title: Strong sales growth for entry-level two-wheelers in H2 of FY24; big relief for automakers
description: The trend continued in April, driven by an improvement in income levels thanks to healthy economic growth, making the automobile industry bullish of a sustained recovery in the twowheeler segment and sparking green shoots of recovery in small car sales.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
